metadata.description: dragons prefix modifiers with stat bonuses/penalties

Hatchling.description: Newly hatched dragon, still learning to fly

Young.description: Juvenile dragon still growing in power

Adult.description: Full-grown dragon at peak physical strength

Elder.description: Ancient dragon with centuries of accumulated knowledge

Great.description: Dragon of exceptional size and might

Primordial.description: Dragon from the dawn of time, embodying primal forces

Legendary.description: Dragon of myth and legend, known across all lands

notes.usage: Stat modifiers applied BEFORE base name. Used at runtime based on item rarity. Not used in pattern generation.
